channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: The kids confuse Chef by blaming Hoppy, a stuffed rabbit, for everything they do wrong.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: The bros go back to school as undercover teachers but have to do as the other says! Luckily, Glow Up Star Axel is there to help disguise the Bros as Mr Longgrass and Mr Pickles.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Pushed out of his comfort zone, Blu must tackle his inability to dance in order to put on a show and impress a celebrity judge. The whole school is counting on him.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Shini meets a Blue Peter fan who balances school with life as a farmer! We?re behind the scenes on the new series of Springwatch, and Joel and Shini find out how to take a picture-perfect wildlife snap from a nine-year-old award-winning photographer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When Ozzie catches bad-luck-itis, Orli and Osgood must go on a magical quest to find the ingredients for the antidote before his increasing bad luck blows apart HQ.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When a museum has square objects stolen and two villains obsessed with triangles are seemingly involved, Orli and Ozzie investigate how the villains can be related to the crime.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Spooky Files
channel.desc: A giant, snot-sneezing Spooky appears and the Spooky Crew must suit up again. But how is this possible, when the portal to the Fear Dimension was meant to be closed forever.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Spooky Files
channel.desc: Chaos manages to open a portal to the Fear Dimension, and a weird Eyeball Spooky pops through ? can the Spooky Crew catch it before it reveals their Spooky secret to Backpack Jess.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A Victorian businessman goes undercover in his own factory, there's a right royal squabble over who should rule medieval England, we meet eccentric Georgian politician Mad Jack Mytton and the Real Tudor Hustle reveals the cleverest con tricks by naughty historical criminals.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Guy Mowbray narrates Elemental Gladiators, Judge Rinder has a science beef, and someone tries to steal the earth?s gold. Gladiator Steel and Big Manny guest star.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: High Hoops
channel.desc: The chance of a trophy has Aoife focused on a win. However, Charlotte is distracted, and Aoife has to ?mute the cute? if Charlotte is going to get back on her game.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Coach Byrne continues to treat the Jamie Johnson FC players harshly, and Bobby becomes convinced he is biased against them. Can Christina stop him before he does something he will regret.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Owen takes over the job of caring for the class hamster and learns he is not so cute.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Duncan tricks Beth into believing she broke his battery-powered bike.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Penfold's addiction to social media helps the Baron turn all of Danger Mouse's secrets against him in a plot to deflate the planet.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: The Princess is back and erases all weekdays so she can play at the weekend forever. Danger Mouse must ruin everyone's lives by fixing the problem.

channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Penfold's addiction to social media helps the Baron turn all of Danger Mouse's secrets against him in a plot to deflate the planet.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Mouse is tested on his experiment to create the perfect family and is sure he will fail! However, his siblings convince him to hire actors to play perfect versions of themselves.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Mouse has built a rocket ship, and fame-seeker Cheese and excitable Dog decide they want to be the first ones to land on Mars. It would be way too dangerous to actually send these two into space, so Mouse stages a fake Mars landing with the help of the others. But when our two astronauts capture the 'aliens', everyone ends up stranded far, far away from home. Like, a 15 minute walk at least.

channel.desc: Mouse has built a rocket ship, and fame-seeker Cheese and excitable Dog decide they want to be the first ones to land on Mars. channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings adopt a cute insect that eats wood. And what's made of wood? The cabin.

channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree that casts maledictions.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface?s hat has been stolen by a Big Ole Worm, and the heroes must quest to get it back. As they trail the worm through the Prickly Desert, Trevor accidentally spikes himself all over on a cactus. But all is not lost ? now that he is covered in sharp spikes, Trevor realises that he has a unique superpower, and when the time comes to confront the Big Ole Worm, it?s Spiky Trevor to the rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: Bentley and Taffy are off on their holidays! Forsythe has promised Mrs Muchmore that they will leave at exactly noon and definitely won?t be late. Bentley thinks this is the perfect time to take Taffy for a walk in the garden?s maze.

channel.title: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of AI
channel.desc: When Blink frames Mansour, the team run a reverse heist to clear his name.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of AI
channel.desc: When Mansour loses Sara?s pet rabbit, Blink causes havoc with lookalike robot rabbits.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Drama
channel.desc: The two teams go to war, firing cabbages from cannons at each other from their respective pirate ships. The first team to sink the other will be the winner, but someone takes a very personal interest in one specific target.
